meanings.definition: A piece of excavating equipment consisting of a digging bucket on the end of a two-part articulated arm.
meanings.sent1: The backhoe dug a deep hole in the ground.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew used the backhoe to clear the site quickly.
meanings.sent3: The backhoe decided to take a break from digging and enjoy the sunshine.
meanings.sent4: The backhoe's arm reached out like a giant metal hand grabbing the earth.
meanings.sent5: The loud roar of the backhoe echoed through the construction site.

meanings.definition: To dig or excavate with a backhoe.
meanings.sent1: They will backhoe the area to prepare it for the foundation.
meanings.sent2: The workers backhoeing the trench worked efficiently to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: I backhoe, you backhoe, we all backhoe for a living!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like a backhoe, digging through any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The backhoeing process turned the once solid ground into a pile of dirt and rocks.
